Text: January February Blazer Ticket Specialsnsf Kate Here are the games in January and February we are able to offer a discount I will send those flyers over for you today Thanks again Ryan Here are the upcoming Blazer specials for a Enron NE employees Blue Section lower level endzone normally Available for some games Purple section upper level center Normally Tan section upper level behind basket Call me to find out our special on Preferred seats during the day of the game BONUS each ticket comes with a Blazer Buck good for food and beverage in the arena To see a map with the colored sections go to and click on arena and tickets Upcoming games January Chicago Bulls February Phoenix Suns February Seattle Supersonics February Minnesota Timberwolves February Boston Celtics February Denver Nuggets February Utah Jazz OR Call for any future Blazer game For tickets please call Ryan Langan or email

Blazers Lakers Playoffsnsf We are sure we will be playing the Lakers in the first round of the playoffs Once this is announced tickets will sell out fast Call me ASAP to reserve your seats The game will likely take place between April th th The NBA Playoffs Are Almost Here Purchase Your Tickets In Advance Now Blue Section lower level endzone Purple section upper level center Tan section upper level behind basket BONUS In addition to bypassing the TicketMaster service fees each ticket comes with worth of Blazer Bucks good for food beverages and merchandise in the Rose Garden To see a map with the colored sections go to and click on arena and tickets For tickets please call Ryan Langan or email me at
